events.name: ServerError
events.description: An unexpected error occurred while processing the request. Request ID: '{RequestId}'.

events.name: ServerErrorWithMessage
events.description: An error occurred while processing the request. Request ID: {RequestId}. Details: '{ErrorMessage:string}'.
events.domainErrorDescription: An error occurred while processing the request. Details: '{ErrorMessage:string}'.

events.name: ServiceUnavailable
events.description: Service unavailable (503). Request ID: {RequestId}. Details: '{ErrorMessage:string}'.

events.name: RedisHostIsNotSpecified
events.description: Startup error: The Redis host configuration is missing.

events.name: RedisPortIsNotSpecified
events.description: Startup error: The Redis port configuration is missing.

events.name: RedisConnectionException
events.description: Startup error: Failed to connect to Redis. Details: '{ErrorMessage:string}'.

events.name: VaultConnectionException
events.description: Startup error: Failed to connect to the Vault. Details: '{ErrorMessage:string}'.

events.name: VaultSecretCastException
events.description: Startup error: Failed to cast retrieved secrets to the expected type. Details: '{ErrorMessage:string}'.

events.name: VaultTokenFileNotFound
events.description: Vault token file '{TokenFile:string}' was not found; set PNKL_VAULT_TOKEN manually.

events.name: VaultTokenFileIsEmpty
events.description: Vault token file '{TokenFile:string}' is empty; set PNKL_VAULT_TOKEN manually.

events.name: VaultTokenLoadedFromFile
events.description: Vault token successfully loaded from file '{TokenFile:string}'.

events.name: LocalConfigurationIsInUse
events.description: Local configuration is in use.

events.name: EndToEndTestsConfigurationIsInUse
events.description: End-to-end tests configuration is in use.

events.name: OptionsValidationException
events.description: Startup error: Options validation exception occurred. Details: '{ErrorMessage:string}'.

events.name: DefaultCacheValueError
events.description: Unable to store a default value {CacheValue}.

events.name: PartialViewNotFound
events.description: Partial view '{PartialViewName:string}' could not be found. Details: '{ErrorMessage:string}'.

events.name: PartialViewRenderingError
events.description: An error occurred while rendering the partial view '{PartialViewName:string}'. Details: '{ErrorMessage:string}'.

events.name: ActionContextNotFound
events.description: Action context not found while trying to build an image URL from a Razor page.

events.name: ImageControllerGetMethodNotFound
events.description: Get image controller's method not found.

events.name: ImageUploadError
events.description: An error occurred while uploading the image. Details: '{ErrorMessage:string}'.

events.name: ImageDownloadError
events.description: An error occurred while downloading the image. Details: '{ErrorMessage:string}'.

events.name: ImageRemovalError
events.description: An error occurred while removing the image. Details: '{ErrorMessage:string}'.

events.name: EntryImageCleanupFailure
events.description: Failed to remove image '{ImageId:Guid}' for entry '{EntryId:Guid}'. Details: '{ErrorMessage:string?}'.

events.name: EntryImageCleanupBatchError
events.description: Unexpected error while processing entry image cleanup batch. Details: '{ErrorMessage:string?}'.

events.name: EntryImageCleanupAbandoned
events.description: Giving up on cleaning entry '{EntryId:Guid}' after {FailureCount:int} attempts.

events.name: OrphanImageCleanupStarted
events.description: Orphan image cleanup run started.

events.name: OrphanImageCleanupCompleted
events.description: Orphan image cleanup run completed. Deleted {DeletedCount:int} images across {ScannedCount:int} scanned objects in {ElapsedSeconds:double} seconds.

events.name: OrphanImageCleanupFailed
events.description: Orphan image cleanup run failed. Details: '{ErrorMessage:string?}'.

events.name: FileUploadException
events.description: An error occurred while uploading the file. Details: '{ErrorMessage:string}'.

events.name: UnverifiedFileSignatureError
events.description: File signature verification failed. Details: '{ErrorMessage:string}'.

events.name: FileSignatureVerificationError
events.description: File signature verification failed for files with extension '{FileExtension:string}', '{HeaderBytes:string?}'.

events.name: RequestIdempotencyKeyViolation
events.description: Request idempotency key violation. The request with the same idempotency key '{IdempotencyKey:string}' is already being processed.
events.domainErrorDescription: A request with the same idempotency key is already being processed.

events.name: WarpContentEmpty
events.description: The entry content is empty.

events.name: WarpExpirationPeriodEmpty
events.description: The entry expiration period is not specified.

events.name: ImageRemovalDomainError
events.description: An error occurred in the domain layer while removing the image '{ImageId:Guid}'. Details: '{ErrorMessage:string}'.

events.name: IdDecodingError
events.description: An error occurred while decoding the ID '{Id:string}'. Details: '{ErrorMessage:string}'.
events.domainErrorDescription: An error occurred while decoding the ID.

events.name: UnauthorizedError
events.description: You do not have permission to perform this action.

events.name: CreatorIdIsNull
events.description: The creator ID is not provided.

events.name: CreatorIdIsNotFound
events.description: The creator ID is not found.

events.name: CantAttachEntryToCreator
events.description: Can't attach the entry '{EntryId:Guid}' to the creator '{CreatorId:Guid}' due to an internal server error.
events.domainErrorDescription: An error occurred while attaching the entry to the creator.

events.name: EntryModelValidationError
events.description: The entry model is invalid. Please check the provided data.

events.name: NoPermissionError
events.description: You do not have permission to access this entry.

events.name: EntryNotFound
events.description: The entry '{EntryId:Guid}' was not found.

events.name: EntryEditModeMismatch
events.description: The entry '{EntryId:Guid}' edit mode is already set to '{EditMode:string}'.
events.domainErrorDescription: The entry edit mode is already set and cannot be changed.

events.name: EntryCannotBeEditedAfterViewed
events.description: The entry '{EntryId:Guid}' cannot be edited after it has been viewed.
events.domainErrorDescription: The entry cannot be edited after it has been viewed. Try to create a new entry.

events.name: EntryInfoModelValidationError
events.description: The entry model is invalid. Please check the provided data.

events.name: VaultCiphertextError
events.description: Failed to get ciphertext from encryption response. Details: '{ErrorMessage:string}'.

events.name: VaultPlaintextError
events.description: Failed to get plaintext from decryption response. Details: '{ErrorMessage:string}'.

events.name: EntryEditModeUnset
events.description: The entry '{EntryId:Guid}' edit mode is not set. Please set the edit mode before editing the entry.
events.domainErrorDescription: The entry edit mode is not set. Please set the edit mode before editing the entry.

events.name: UnsupportedFileExtension
events.description: The file extension is not supported.
events.domainErrorDescription: The file extension '{FileExtension:string}' is not supported. Please use one of the following extensions: {SupportedFileExtensions:string}.

events.name: ImageAlreadyExists
events.description: The image already exists.
events.domainErrorDescription: The image '{UntrustedImageName:string}' you are trying to upload already exists.

events.name: S3ListObjectsError
events.description: An error occurred while listing objects in S3. Details: '{ErrorMessage:string}'.
events.domainErrorDescription: An error occurred while listing objects.

events.name: S3DeleteObjectError
events.description: An error occurred while deleting an object from S3. Details: '{ErrorMessage:string}'.
events.domainErrorDescription: An error occurred while deleting an object.

events.name: S3UploadObjectError
events.description: An error occurred while uploading an object to S3. Details: '{ErrorMessage:string}'.
events.domainErrorDescription: An error occurred while uploading an object.

events.name: S3GetObjectError
events.description: An error occurred while getting an object from S3. Details: '{ErrorMessage:string}'.
events.domainErrorDescription: An error occurred while getting an object.

events.name: FileNameIsMissing
events.description: The file name is missing. Please provide a valid file name.

events.name: FileIsEmpty
events.description: The file is empty. Please provide a valid file.

events.name: FileSizeExceeded
events.description: The file size is {Actual:long} bytes. Yoy can upload files up to {MaxFileSize:long} bytes.

events.name: FileTypeNotPermitted
events.description: The provided file type is not permitted.

events.name: MultipartReaderError
events.description: An error occurred while creating the MultipartReader. Probably the request is not a multipart/form-data request.

events.name: MultipartContentTypeBoundaryError
events.description: The content-type boundary is missing. Please provide a valid content-type boundary.

events.name: MultipartBoundaryLengthLimitExceeded
events.description: The multipart boundary length limit has been exceeded. Please provide a valid content-type boundary.
